content: Created `pyproject.toml` configuring a setuptools-based `src/` layout project with a `math-coverage` console script entry point and pytest settings for running the CLI’s tests.

output.code:
from pathlib import Path
import json

target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('pyproject.toml')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = [
"""[build-system]
requires = ["setuptools>=69.0", "wheel"]
build-backend = "setuptools.build_meta""",
"""[project]
name = "math-coverage-cli"
version = "0.1.0"
description = "Deterministic CLI that generates Mathematics coverage matrix and evaluation loop artifacts."
readme = "README.md"
requires-python = ">=3.10"
license = {text = "MIT"}
authors = [{name = "OpenAI Code Interpreter"}]
dependencies = []

[project.scripts]
math-coverage = "math_coverage_cli:main"

[project.optional-dependencies]
dev = ["pytest>=8.0"]""",
"""[tool.setuptools]
package-dir = {"" = "src"}
py-modules = ["math_coverage_cli", "math_taxonomy", "renderers", "io_utils"]""",
"""[tool.pytest.ini_options]
minversion = "8.0"
addopts = "-q"
testpaths = ["tests"]
pythonpath = ["src"]"""
]

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')

print('FILE_WRITTEN:pyproject.toml')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

content.text: Created `pyproject.toml` configuring a setuptools-based `src/` layout project with a `math-coverage` console script entry point and pytest settings for running the CLI’s tests.
